full_summary:
=================================
## Transportation and Economic Analysis Data Vault

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

Transportation Canada (TC) invites bids for a data analysis services contract. This project aims to increase the maturity of data management and analytics within TC, both strategically and operationally.

### Key Services

TC requires consulting services with expertise in:

* Data strategy and governance
* Operational data management
* Data quality
* Lean Six Sigma

The successful bidder will provide a pre-defined framework to guide the development of a data management foundation at both the strategic and operational levels.

### Outstanding Requirements

At the strategic level, the bidder must:

* Identify gaps and priorities in compliance with Government of Canada policies, directives, and standards
* Establish the governance of the data and analytics program

At the unit level, the bidder must:

* Understand the operational data management and stewardship activities required to reduce data risks

### Bidding Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013457
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 6, 2022 at 14:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada
* **Region of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR), Canada
* **Languages:** English and French

### Submission Requirements

Bidders must submit their proposals electronically through the Canadabuys platform.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

Barbara Gorman
Transport Canada
330 Sparks Street
Ottawa, ON K1A 0N5
barbara.gorman@tc.gc.ca

Attachments:

* English RFP: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/14/4bc29f3aa290b373ee94a1980a998f3c/npp_-_english_t8080-220282.pdf
* French RFP: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/14/e62f02be5d605ebf5f3d135480435393/apm_-_french_t8080-220282.pdf

### Important Notes

* This RFP has expired and is no longer accepting bids. Transport Canada is not responsible for any errors or omissions in this notice. translateY
